Components.Label: DefaultFee
Create Quote
Components.Query:
select DefaultFee.*,FeeType.Description as FeeType,FeeType.IsFreight,FeeType.GroupName as GroupFee,MasterData.Name as UnitName
from DefaultFee
left join FeeType on DefaultFee.DescriptionId = FeeType.Id
left join MasterData on DefaultFee.UnitId = MasterData.Id
where InquiryDetailId in ('{InquiryDetailIds}')
order by DefaultFee.UnitId asc

select Pricing.*
from InquiryDetail
left join Pricing on InquiryDetail.PricingId = Pricing.Id
where InquiryDetail.Id in ('{InquiryDetailIds}')

GridPolicies.Label: Currency
Unit CTNR
Unit Price
Description
Unit
Payee

Components.Label: Create Quote
Components.Query:
select DefaultFee.*,FeeType.Description as FeeType,FeeType.IsFreight,FeeType.GroupName as GroupFee,MasterData.Name as UnitName
from DefaultFee
left join FeeType on DefaultFee.DescriptionId = FeeType.Id
left join MasterData on DefaultFee.UnitId = MasterData.Id
where InquiryDetailId in ('{InquiryDetailIds}')
order by DefaultFee.UnitId asc

select Pricing.*
from InquiryDetail
left join Pricing on InquiryDetail.PricingId = Pricing.Id
where InquiryDetail.Id in ('{InquiryDetailIds}')
